name: Pixel Fall
description:
Pixel Fall is a game where, well, there are actually plenty of pixels falling to the ground and you need to catch them ! Get as many as possible to upgrades your paddle stats and get more pixels !

Use arrows or A/D  to move left and right, spacebar to activate your ability and your mouse to naviguate trough the upgrades.

Catch, upgrade, discover, and get all the achievement in PixelFall !
